Skip to contents
theRmalUAV 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Function reference

    General

    Get necessary information and report end results

    T_uav_info()
    Gets all the necessary info
    T_uav_sensors()
    Provides a list of supported sensors
    T_uav_report()
    Makes a TheRmalUAV report
    T_uav_export()
    Exports thermal data as tiff-files

    Position

    Calculate, view and refine sensor locations

    T_uav_pos_sensor()
    Gets the information about the locations of the cameras
    T_uav_pos_view()
    Shows the cameras/image extents on an interactive map
    T_uav_prep_coreg()
    Prepares data for coregistration
    T_uav_pos_coreg()
    Coregister locations with another camera

    Clean

    Clean thermal datasets based on overlap and or sharpness

    T_uav_clean_thresh()
    Get sharpness threshold
    T_uav_clean_persec()
    Keeps the best image per second
    T_uav_clean_reduc()
    Clean the dataset based on overlap or sharpness

    Correct

    Correct thermal datasets for atmosphere, emissivity and in flight fluctuations

    T_uav_corr_atm()
    Computes atmospheric corrections
    T_uav_corr_emis()
    Corrects for emissivity
    T_uav_corr_smooth()
    Smooths thermal data

    Class

    S4 class in which the information and data is stored within the R-environment

    Thermal.UAV-Class
    Class "Thermal.UAV"

    On this page
